definition: little white mouse (esp. laboratory animal)/fig. guinea pig, i.e. human participant in experiment

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The immunosuppression model was established by CTX injected into abdominal cavity of the KunMing Mus musculus albus.
sentences.chinese: 採用腹腔注射CTX誘導昆明小白鼠免疫抑制模型。

sentences.english: Sinisan also dilatate vessel in auricle of mice.
sentences.chinese: 同時也發現四逆散還能擴張小白鼠耳廓血管。

sentences.english: and accused him of using 1.3 billion Chinese as lab mice.
sentences.chinese: 然後指責他把十三億中國人民當成實驗室裏的小白鼠。

sentences.english: Polysaccharides of CGP can improve the immune function of mice.
sentences.chinese: 表明CGP能明顯提高小白鼠的免疫功能。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effect of Cortex Albiziae solution pentobarbital-induced hypnosis in mice.

sentences.english: In all of these experimentsdecidual cells showed degeneration and necrosis.
sentences.chinese: 實驗組小白鼠的蛻膜細胞全部退變壞死。

sentences.english: If you stop these immune cells from working, the animals didn’t get drunk.
sentences.chinese: 如果阻止了免疫細胞的活動，小白鼠就不會醉酒。

sentences.english: Not only those of the rat race, all human beings.
sentences.chinese: 不僅僅是實驗小白鼠，所有人類都是。

sentences.english: VZV was insensitive to newborn white mouse too.
I have something to tell you, white mouse, " she said.
You don't mass-produce "test-beds" in quantities exceeding 200.
sentences.chinese: 你所謂的“小白鼠”已經批產超過了200架。

sentences.english: He then asked each volunteer to decapitate a white rat.
sentences.chinese: 然後他讓每個志願者砍掉一隻小白鼠的頭。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the influence of propofol on gastrointestinal peristalsis in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察異丙酚對小白鼠胃腸蠕動功能的影響。

sentences.english: Totally 72,5-6 weeks old Kunming mice were selected.
